content.text: Match ends, Leicester City 3, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, Leicester City 3, Watford 0.
Goal!  Leicester City 3, Watford 0. Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jamie Vardy following a fast break.
Juan Zuñiga (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Islam Slimani (Leicester City).
Attempt blocked. Stefano Okaka (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré.
Corner,  Leicester City. Conceded by Adrian Mariappa.

Foul by Abdoulaye Doucouré (Watford).
Andy King (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Offside, Watford. Stefano Okaka tries a through ball, but Troy Deeney is caught offside.
